description: This file defines a custom Angular Material theme called 'material-blue-theme' using a palette and theme configuration, and applies all component themes. It also includes CSS variables for primary, accent, and secondary blue colors.

methods.name: define-light-theme
methods.description: Creates a custom light theme using specified color palettes and typography settings.

methods.name: define-palette
methods.description: Defines a color palette based on a base color and optional hue variants.

methods.name: define-typography-config
methods.description: Configures typography settings for the theme.

methods.name: all-component-themes
methods.description: Applies the theme to all Angular Material components.
